zone.line: It
Exhibits then the stars course
And when nature thee instructs
Then goes the mindpower to thee away
As speaks a ghost with another ghost.
In vain that dry emblem here
characters
The holy emblem to thee exhibits.
Ye float ye ghosts, near me
Answer me, if ye he me hear
(He strikes the book open, & percieves the
emblem of Macrocosmus)
Ah! what delight rushes in this glance
For once to me thro' all my senses!
I feel young, holy life's pleasure
New-glowing to me thro nerves & veins run's.
Where is the God, who these characters wrote?
Who to me the inward raging stilled
The miserable heart with friendship filled
And with mysterious impulse.
